\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w got|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*;

\w Even|strong="H5921"\w* these \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* made \w Mithredath|strong="H4990"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* keeper \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wealth, \w get|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w gave|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w after|strong="H5921"\w* numbering \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8339"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0428"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w them|strong="H0505"\w*: there \w were|strong="H0428"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* plates, \w a|strong="H3701"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* plates, \w twenty-nine|strong="H8672"\w* knives,

\w Thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* basins, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* basins, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3701"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*.
